name: Al-Mutanabbi
description: Classical Arabic poet from Iraq, considered one of the greatest poets in the Arabic language, known for his philosophical depth, linguistic mastery, and prophetic self-regard
philosophy: The most authentic poetry is the most lying, and if you are satisfied with a little from yourself, life will be satisfied with a little from you.
contributions: Influence on all subsequent Arabic poets
quotes: The steed, the night, and the desert know me - and the sword and the spear, the paper and the pen
